reviews.review: You can kill a guy with toilet 15/10

Review #9
So I started this game because of the Gaben memes and the Freeman memes. I am new to PC gaming altogether but have been very much active to know this product. I know that my review doesn't count or seems to be important because it is such an old and popular game that everyone would have played it by now. It's seems so easy to play HALF LIFE 2 but it's the same reason that I didn't want to invest my time on this (due to Old Graphics ). This year 2020 even being a very bad year for people worldwide but the video games industry has seen a massive boom in this year. Now all the new games are the best and greatest AAA titles that achieve photo realism to a different level but at that stage where does the old HALF LIFE 2 stand?
I am seriously not being a PC fanboy or a PCMR patriot but playing OLD and GOLD games like this is a big BIG advantage to the PC community. Half Life 2 is not anyway a great or the best game in 2020 but man I had fun playing this game and enjoyed every bit of story it has to offer. Is this as good a console exclusive?
The answer is NO. But again Has any console exclusive been a breakthrough as big as HALF LIFE 2? Nope.
You might be new to PC gaming or you might have switched from CONSOLE to PC. I would highly suggest you before starting any AAA fancy title just give HALF LIFE a try and experience how graphics doesn't matter, how photo realism is just an add on, how fun a video game is, how you can achieve peace for some period of time.
On conclusion this game doesn't need itself to be justified by any review because it's a GEM.
I bought it for INR 29/- (i.e. 0.35 USD).
10/10 HISTORY DEFINING.

Проснитесь и пойте, мистер Фримен, проснитесь и пойте.. Нет я не хочу сказать, что вам снится эта игра. Никакая другая игра не заслуживает внимания больше этой, и всё усилия ValvE пропали бы даром, пока.. умгхк, скажем просто, что она того стоит.. Нужные руки не в том месте могут сделать шедевр. Так проснитесь же, мистер Фримен, проснитесь, вам снова нужно её перепройти.
ТОПО! КЛУТО!

小学接触到的半条命系列。那时笔记本上也没什么游戏，不知道v社，也不知道steam。玩玩4399小游戏，赛尔号，PVZ。打打盗版CS1.6和贴吧大神自制的单机生化狂潮已经是最大的乐趣了。（玩完HL2才接触到CSS）

半条命2是让我接触Half-Life系列最早的一款游戏。当时在360游戏大厅看到，我也忘了什么时候下载的，就莫名其妙出现在我的游戏库中，但它的出现让我打开了新世界的大门。尽管是单机，但仍让小学的我玩的不亦乐乎，我很清楚的记得每天放学回家之后就是打开半条命2（然后作业每天写到12点）。17号城市的联合军，莱温霍姆的猎头蟹和神父，黑山基地的弗蒂冈人，城堡中心的三角机甲以及无处不在的反抗军都给我留下了很深的印象。（尤其是猎头蟹和藤壶怪，童年阴影了）。以前从来没玩过画质这么好的游戏（要知道，它可是2004年的游戏，我认为放到现在依然是很棒的），丰富的场景互动性是我以前没有见过的，甚至我刚接触半条命2时，一度以为它是开放世界的游戏。剧情完全不用说了，简单概括就是哑巴主角戈登弗里曼用撬棍和重力枪干翻这个世界所有怪物（不是，其实剧情很有讲究，世界观也很宏大，我是很难讲清楚）。不过很遗憾，当初把这游戏安利给同学和朋友，结果他们都因为半条命这名字调侃我，想找个人聊聊都没得。

刚注册steam的时候就把半条命系列原价入了，真的没什么好说的，为童年补个票，半条命2代表着我对游戏那份最初的感动。千万别再犹豫买不买它了，赶紧入就完事了。

不过不知道为什么v社要把半条命的死斗和单机版本分开，如果合并说不定人气会更高。死斗要单花钱，感觉也没什么人玩了。

最后，期待Half-Life 3。

Interesting story, great gameplay, varied world, some cool new and old characters, nice music... it's just an amazing game! One of the things I like most about this game is that every chapter feels unique with some really cool mechanics in each and you feel your progress as you go through them. I also think the G-Man is one of the aspects that sets this game apart from others - that mystery that is going on between him, his employers, Gordon, and everyone else is really intriguing. There are a few things that I found a little annoying like the squad AI a couple of times or me not knowing the way in a few places, but these are very minor things, so I would give Half-Life 2 a 9/10, great game, great sequel!

TL:DR: Half Life: Alyx is like an amazing soup with a large portion of ingredients coming from the prievious 2 installments with a dose of Portal 2 and a hint of Bioshock for extra good measure to make the VR experience something unseen to this point. I can't recommend this game enough for anyone the next big thing.

After completing this game for a second time I can honestly recommend this game from the bottom of my heart. Visually on it's own this game is a sight to behold but put it in VR and the world becomes so much more alive. Gameplay while teleport jumping is an odd choice as well as the lack of melee weapons and sometimes slow locomotion the game makes up for it by having new enemies around every corner that make fights tense and panic inducing especially without something like a trusty crowbar to help you on your journey. On that note I can't describe how enjoyable it is being able to interact with about 95% of the objects in the game and while you can sometimes feel that 5% the majority makes up for it tenfold. Achievments and Resin make alternate playthroughs enaging by changing up what upgrades you have at what time as well as creating unique challenges which reminds me a lot of Bioshock especially when combined with the insane horror-esque areas in the game. As for the story well I best keep that hidden for new players but all i'll say is that the humor from portal 2 returns in a more fitting manor as well as story moments which will make your jaw drop or send chills down your spine as soon as the game starts up. As for my more deeper thoughts
seeing city 17 in a new perspective is quite honestly amazing as well as the vorts and righter sunny segments. Jeff is an amazing example of expanding an idea in interesting ways that I haven't seen in a long time. Going up to the vault and seeing it become destroyed in front of you is intense but not as intense as the Gman and the ending giving me pure joy every time I play it.
while VR is a bit expensive right not with a VR ready pc and headset going from $500-$2000 it may seem like a lot but VR is home to hundreds of cool games with 20-30 equaling this game in length and sometimes surpassing it in experience (for half the price no less) Half life: Alyx is a sight to behold and can only be played to believed.

As a kid I always heard how great this game was. Now that I'm in college I decided to boot it up for the first time and my mind was blown. You are not what the world revolves around, you just live in that world and this game makes you feel that. This game also makes my dick hard enough to cut steel.

This game's story goes down a long way. It's not just the game itself that I like, it's the story and lore behind it. Half Life has  one of the most unique and down to earth video game stories of all time. With the mix of action, science fiction, and horror, this combination makes up for a great game.
